metadata.title: Energizer ENB-PF10 Digital Replacement Battery DMW-BCF10 for Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS1, FS25, FX580, TS1 and FS33 (Black)
features: Replaces the Panasonic DMW-BCF10 Li-ion Battery
Compatible with Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS1/FS25/FX580/TS1/FS33 and similar camera models
Can be used with original lithium-ion battery charger
This Li-ion battery is 100% memory-free and will not suffer from the inconvenient memory effects that are typically associated with similar battery types.
description: This high-power 3.7V 700mAh Energizer Li-ion battery replaces the DMW-BCF10 for Panasonic Lumix DMC-FS1/FS25/FX580/TS1/FS33 and similar camera models. This rechargeable battery can be charged at any battery level, always allowing a full charge (100% memory-free).
